duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and execute strategies and programs to help clients optimize their global talent investment, develop global leaders, and manage their expatriate programs.
Provide expertise on global mobility policy development, advice on global mobility compensation data, and consulting on ad-hoc mobility projects including cost modeling and talent management.
Support large client accounts and manage the existing mobility client portfolio which involves regular service calls, account reviews, and managing the renewal process.
Ensure clients are connected to Mercer’s full range of Mobility offerings and serve as a technical reviewer for client deliverables related to Mobility.
Lead complex projects including large scale program design and policy reviews, and manage major RFPs as well as vendor reviews.
Collaborate with Mobility Production Group to improve the design and delivery of mobility data.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Human Resource Management, International Studies, Economics, or related field (Master's preferred)
